Class PoolRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.concurrency.PoolExecutor<java.lang.Runnable>

  • public class PoolRunner
extends PoolExecutor<java.lang.Runnable>
    PoolRunner class creates thread pool adopted to run Runnable tasks
